alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:15AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Adams and southwestern Whitman Counties through 1045 AM PDT... At 1014 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Kahlotus, or 23 miles east of Connell, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ritzville, Washtucna, Ralston, Pizzro, and Marengo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 220 and 227. U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 91 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
